front.title: An Intelligent SDN Framework based on Meta-Model with Software-Defined Pricing (SDP)

abstract.t: This document defines a notion called Software-Defined Pricing (SDP) and introduces it into a Software-Defined Networks (SDN) framework. The SDN system with SDP inside is expected to promote the efficiency on SDN resources usage and ease management for service providers.This document also defines a mechanism that can efficiently mannage SDN framework orderly and intelligently.
